name: Frantic Farmer's Rabbit Riot
description:
You're feeling frantic in this fast-paced, zany Match-5 casual video game!

You are Frantic Farmer and your crop was just about ready to pick until that ravaging rabbit and his big 'ole family showed up again. Do your best to match 5 seeds vertically, and if you can make all your plants grow before those rabbits eat them, you win!

CONTROLS

Controller:

Left joystick to move selector

A button to select and swap pieces also select menu items

X button for sending a worm in multiplayer

Keyboard:

Player 1:

WASD to move the selector

Spacebar to select and swap pieces also select menu items

M button for sending the worm in multiplayer

Player 2:

Arrows to move the selector

L button to select and swap pieces

K button for sending a worm in multiplayer
